citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:30am on
01/13/2016.
The licensee was not available due to family obligations that day. The inspection was attempted by ACI Bartels and
VMO Heezen.
Additional Inspectors
Heezen Dee, Veterinary Medical Officer
